title: Mark Knopfler Guitar Styles, Vol. 2
description: Eight more hit songs: Brothers in Arms * Going Home * Heavy Fuel * Money for Nothing * Planet of New Orleans * The Man's Too Strong * Walk of Life * You and Your Friend. Includes a continuation of the interview begun in Vol. I; more details of Mark's guitars, effects and amps; and more previously unseen color photos.
author: Mark Knopfler
